text: for two years the British photographer
John Cantlie was missing in Syria no one
knew where he was or who had taken him
or even if he was alive or dead
that was until he emerged in a series of
ghoulish propaganda videos by the group
calling itself the Islamic state maybe I
will live and maybe I will die for
John's father the videos at least ended
two years of questions having lost his
voice to cancer mr. kentley addresses
the kidnappers and allow him save lives
this is the first time the family have
spoken publicly about their ordeal
mr. countly scene is doing this on
television because the family is unsure
if private messages have been received
this is not I would imagine I will be
spending my first year I want John to
have a very broad audience I can think
of no greater joy than seeing him again
released not a large origin love
but the so-called Islamic state have
used kidnapping as an everyday even
necessary tactic of war now the jihadis
are being bombed by a coalition that
includes Britain today's appeal
therefore is the longest of long shots
but the family feel they have to try
anything and everything to get John
Cantlie home
